title: Bots in aram
body:
Today I encountered bots in aram, not the first time, but it was the first time that I've been the only human player on my team. It really sucked. I added them to my block list and I had to play with them two more times today. They've completely ruined 3 games for me today, and I don't want to play with them. I've also reported them.

Why can't you make it so we get the option of accepting a game with known blocked players or not? If I leave, I'll get leave buster, it's a no win situation. If given the chance, I would've said no to playing those additional 2 games, but instead  Riot, you made me suffer through them.  Not happy.

replies.body:
I'm really sorry to hear that and something our team here is cracking down on. If you could submit a player support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

We can look at the match you played in and investigate from there. Thanks for helping us clean things up.

This is not a solution, either temporary or permanent.
I've been dealing with these things for roughly a year now, and lets say every time I play an ARAM game I have to submit a ticket. I would be spending more time describing tickets that I would playing the freaking game! 
The solution, to me, is simple: Change the reporting system in ARAM to reflect the system used in SR. All this means is that _when you report a player on SR they seem to be removed from your matchmaking pool._ This is not the case in ARAM and we are forced to either play a losing game or cop a leaverbuster punishment. I obviously don't know how script writing works, or if you can even combat an issue like this on such a level, but for the love of all that is holy - when I report the _same account three times in three days_, **TAKE THEM OUT OF MY MATCH MAKING POOL!** Reporting these accounts seems to count for nothing, so why the hell would I waste even more time submitting a ticket? 

I hope this get copy-pasted and plastered EVERYWHERE!

This has effected me also.
I am absolutely sick of the bots in OCE ARAM not to mention the amount of bots in dominion NA, It is ruining the game and I think something needs to be done about this, ARAM and dominion are good game types for casual players like me. I have Quit the Q lobby several times , because it is obvious I have a team of bots , SO of course I get penalised! I Have sunk money into this game which I now think is a waste because of the lack of customer service in this issue. I have reported and reported that there are bots and with each patch no bug fixes have been applied.
